lyrics:
2 contributorsgood cowboy lyricsverse 1
say things to me like a cowgirl would
and ill do tricks for you like a cowboy should
oh you look romantic laying in the hay
and i need you tonight in a new kinda way
when you look at me with those eyes
oh it makes me start to fantasize

prechorus
do it to me like i know you could
so i can do it to you baby like a cowboy should

verse 2
im ridin the range i think of you
i dig your chili and you know its true
yeah i make big money put it in the bank
yeah that longhorn caddy got a great big tank

prechorus
oh do it to me like i know you could
and i can do it to you baby like a cowboy should

chorus
oh youre the kinda woman whos above the rest
nothing for me but the best
you say you need a fella who really can
do it you good like a cowboy man
see brooks  dunn liveget tickets as low as 30you might also likeverse 3
got a massive wardrobe of cowboy clothes
from the top of my head to the tip of my toes
ah you look so good in my hat with fringe on it
so put on my boots oh doggone it

outro
yeah do it to me like i know you could
and i can do it to you baby like a cowboy should
do it to me like i know you could
and i could do it to you honey like a cowboy should
thats rightembed
